Add a new expense record..summary: Jade Green attempted to add a new expense record but did not complete the task due to the complexity and length of the process. The app's interface provided various options for recording the expense, but Jade Green found it overwhelming.
reflections: Jade Green learned that the app supports adding expense records by allowing users to select categories, accounts, and other transaction details.
The task was not completed, possibly due to the numerous steps and options available, which may have led to confusion.
To improve the experience, Jade Green might consider focusing on simpler tasks first or breaking down the process into smaller steps to better understand the app's functionalities.

The transition between pages was smooth, indicating that the app is user-friendly and intuitive for navigating through tasks.
